script:
1). You're going to be finished by tomorrow, aren't you?
No, I'm going fishing on Thursday.
Yes, I think I will. 
Yes, you are.
2). Where were Kendra and Phil yesterday?
They had the day off. 
They have been in a meeting.
They will be on vacation.
3). Does Allen work on Thursdays?
Yes, he works Saturday.
Yes, Allen works here.
Yes, he usually does.
